Uses of Package
pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors

  • Packages that use pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.experiments  
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography
    Package for orthographic representation, i.e., making vectors based on the characters that occur in a string.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.tables
    Package for creating semantic vectors from tabular data.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors
    Core representations and operations on vectors over different ground fields.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.viz
    Contains various classes for plotting results in two dimensions.
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors 
    Class and Description
    RealVector.RealBindMethod
    Enumeration of binding operation options.
    Vector
    Base representation of a vector over a particular ground field and vector operations.
    VectorType
    Enumeration of the different types of coordinates that can be used for vectors, and (in the complex case), whether circular or cartesian methods are used.
    ZeroVectorException 
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.experiments 
    Class and Description
    ZeroVectorException 
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography 
    Class and Description
    Vector
    Base representation of a vector over a particular ground field and vector operations.
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.tables 
    Class and Description
    Vector
    Base representation of a vector over a particular ground field and vector operations.
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors 
    Class and Description
    BinaryVector
    Binary implementation of Vector.
    ComplexVector
    Complex number implementation of Vector.
    ComplexVector.Mode
    We use the 'MODE' enumeration to keep track of which mode the complex vector is in.
    RealVector
    Real number implementation of Vector.
    RealVector.RealBindMethod
    Enumeration of binding operation options.
    Vector
    Base representation of a vector over a particular ground field and vector operations.
    VectorType
    Enumeration of the different types of coordinates that can be used for vectors, and (in the complex case), whether circular or cartesian methods are used.
  • Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors used by pitt.search.semanticvectors.viz 
    Class and Description
    ZeroVectorException
